TELiX MSG: 0ZU06-00 19/08/24 08:42 +03:00
/Uno
Good Day,
Please propose for the flw:
MV KS CAMELLIA (36K/LOG/SCRUBBER)       OPEN SUSAKI, JAPAN       1 - 6 SEP, 2024
- FULLY FITTED LOGGER
- SCRUBBER FITTED
- PKE/SALT/SCRAP OK
- 25MT X 2 TIER + ON DECK CARGO OK
+++
MV KS CAMELLIA
BUILD : 2015.11 / SHIKOKU, JAPAN
FLAG : PANAMA
CLASS : KR
TYPE : BULK CARRIER / LOG FITTED
SDWT : 36169.60 METRIC TONNES
SDRAFT : 10.125 METRES
LOA : 179.8 METRES
BEAM : 30.4 METRES
HOLDS/HATCHES : 5 / 5 (2/3/4 BOX SHAPED)
GRAIN / BALE 44724.61CBM / 43429.75 CBM
TPC : 48.18 MT
GRT / NRT : 22522 / 11365
CRANES : 4 x 31.2MT
SPEED/CONS : (B) ABT 13.5 KN ON ABT 20.7MT FO + 0.2 MT/DAY MGO
(L) ABT 12.7 KN ON ABT 20.7MT FO + 0.2 MT/DAY MGO
IN PORT
IDLE : ABT 1.6 M/T FO + ABT 0.9 M/T MGO/DAY
WORKING : ABT 4.1 M/T FO + ABT 0.9 M/T MGO/DAY
ECO (ALWAYS WOG FOR REFERENCE ONLY)
BALLAST : ABT 12.0 KNOTS ON ABT 15.0 M/T FO + 0.2 M/T MGO/DAY
LADEN : ABT 11.5 KNOTS ON ABT 15.5 M/T FO + 0.2 M/T MGO/DAY
ADA WOG
+++
Best Regards,
Uno Cho
Senior Chartering Manager
DryDel Shipping Singapore Pte Ltd
Tel: +65 6654 1264
Mob: +65 9665 3905
Email: chartering@drydelmaritime.com
www.drydelshipping.com
